cat /root/scripts/backup.sh
#!/bin/bash
# Legacy backup script

BACKUP_SRC="/etc/shadow"
BACKUP_DST="/root/scripts/shadow_bak.txt"

# This script runs as root via cron

if [ -f "$BACKUP_SRC" ]; then
    cp "$BACKUP_SRC" "$BACKUP_DST"
    chown root:root "$BACKUP_DST"
    chmod 600 "$BACKUP_DST"
    echo "[`date`] Backup successful." >> /root/scripts/backup.log
else
    echo "[`date`] Backup failed: source missing." >> /root/scripts/backup.log
fi
